name: Dragon Capture Jar (Anime)
text: Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Rock/EARTH/Level 2/ATK 100/DEF 200). (This card is also still a Trap Card.) While this card is on the field, all Dragon-Type monsters that you and your opponent control are banished. This card gains DEF equal to the total combined DEF of all monsters that are banished by this card's effect.
